OwnershipStatus: unknown ownership
Notes: Parts of the site have potential for future residential develoment subject to consideration of the impact upon listed structures/buildings and scheduled ancient monuments.

OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
Notes: The site has been occupied by a permanent structure but the remains have not sufficiently blended into the landscape over the process of time. There is a possibility that the site may be required to meet unmet open space needs but there is no conclusive evidence to this effect, Whilst the nearby junior school is at capacity certain types of residential development would be possible without an increase in demand for school places. Furthermore the potential for expansion of the nearby schools is as yet undetermined. Provided biodiversity impacts can be mitigated the site would be appropriate for residential development.

SiteNameAddress: "Red House HOP & Spire Lodge, Sheffield Road, Chesterfield"
OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
Notes: On the basis that the site would only be available should Derbyshire County Council have concluded that the service/facility provided is no longer necessary the site is an appropriate location for residential development. The constraints posed by Sheffield Road to the west is not significant. Other identified constraints are likely to be mitigable.

OwnershipStatus: unknown ownership
Notes: The site is not essential to ensuring an adequate supply of employment land or premises in terms of quantity. There is a need for further information on the relationship with adjoining commercial/industrial land uses and whether or not a good level of amenity might be feasible should adjoining land uses continue in commercial/industrial use. The site is not within walking distance of a centre and is not within a Regeneration Priority Area. There is insuffiicent information on the adequacy of education and GP provision in the locality. Accordingly the site is not currently considered to be appropriate for residential development.
